com.yahoo.sketches.theta

Class CompactSketch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.sketches.theta.Sketch
      • com.yahoo.sketches.theta.CompactSketch

  • public abstract class CompactSketch
extends Sketch
    The parent class of all the CompactSketches. CompactSketches are never created directly. They are created as a result of the compact() method of an UpdateSketch or as a result of a getResult() of a SetOperation.

    A CompactSketch is the simplist form of a Theta Sketch. It consists of a compact list (i.e., no intervening spaces) of hash values, which may be ordered or not, a value for theta and a seed hash. A CompactSketch is read-only, and the space required when stored is only the space required for the hash values and 8 to 24 bytes of preamble. An empty CompactSketch consumes only 8 bytes.

    Author:
    Lee Rhodes

        public int getRetainedEntries(boolean valid)
        Description copied from class: Sketch
        Returns the number of entries that have been retained by the sketch.
        Specified by:
        getRetainedEntries in class Sketch
        Parameters:
        valid - if true, returns the number of valid entries, which are less than theta and used for estimation. Otherwise, return the number of all entries, valid or not, that are currently in the internal sketch cache.
        Returns:
        the number of retained entries
